```{r}
endangered_status <- readr::read_csv(
  'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/main/data/2025/2025-12-23/endangered_status.csv'
)

df <- dplyr::count(endangered_status, status_label)

ojs_define(df = df)
```

```{ojs}
data = transpose(df)

Plot.plot({
  title: "Number of languages per status",
  x: {label: "Status"},
  y: {label: "Number of languages", ticks: 5},
  marks: [
    Plot.barY(data, {x: "status_label", y: "n", fill: "status_label", sort: {x: "-y"}}),
    Plot.ruleY([0])
  ]
})
```
